original: Oxidized methionine residues can be quantified using liquid chromatography-tandem mass spectrometry (LC-MS/MS), which facilitates the generation of methionine stability curves. These curves serve as indicators of drug binding affinity. However, the SPROX (Stability of Proteins from Rates of Oxidation) assay has certain limitations.
